pages.title: About Me
pages.text: Zhongquan Zhou Computer Science Student @ Lanzhou University <div class="contact-info"> <p><i class="icon icon-mail"></i> Email: zhouzhq2021@lzu.edu.cn</p> <p><i class="icon icon-location"></i> Location: Liaocheng, Shandong, China</p> <p><i class="icon icon-github"></i> GitHub: <a href="https://github.com/zhouzhq2021" target="_blank">zhouzhq2021</a></p> </div> Education 2021 - 2025 Lanzhou University Bachelor of Science in Computer Science and Technology School of Information Science and Engineering Technical Skills Programming Languages Python â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜† C++ â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜† Java â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜†â˜† JavaScript â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜†â˜† Web Development HTML+CSS â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜†â˜† Vue.js â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜†â˜† Tools & Technologies Git â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜† Linux â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜†â˜† Research Interests Software Development Machine Learning Web Development Open Source Projects Achievements Communist Party Member Active contributor to open-source projects Passionate about technology and continuous learning .about-page { max-width: 800px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 20px; font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Arial, sans-serif; } .profile-section { text-align: center; margin-bottom: 40px; } .avatar-section { margin-bottom: 20px; } .avatar { width: 200px; height: 200px; border-radius: 50%; margin-bottom: 15px; } .subtitle { color: #666; font-size: 1.2em; } .contact-info { margin: 20px 0; } .contact-info p { margin: 10px 0; } .section { margin: 40px 0; } h2 { border-bottom: 2px solid #eee; padding-bottom: 10px; margin-bottom: 20px; } .timeline-item { display: flex; margin-bottom: 20px; } .year { flex: 0 0 120px; font-weight: bold; } .content { flex: 1; } .skill-grid { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr)); gap: 20px; } .skill-category { background: #f8f9fa; padding: 15px; border-radius: 5px; } .skill-category h3 { margin-bottom: 10px; color: #333; } ul { list-style-type: none; padding-left: 0; } li { margin: 8px 0; } .interests ul, .achievements ul { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr)); gap: 10px; } .interests li, .achievements li { background: #f8f9fa; padding: 10px; border-radius: 5px; text-align: center; } @media (max-width: 600px) { .timeline-item { flex-direction: column; } .year { margin-bottom: 5px; } .skill-grid { grid-template-columns: 1fr; } }

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to my blog! This is a test post with multiple tags. Quick Start Create a new post 1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server 1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files 1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites 1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
